text: int main ( ) { long int testcases ; scanf ( "%ld" , & testcases ) ; for ( long int c = 1 ; c <= testcases ; c ++ ) { long int n , a , b ; scanf ( "%ld" , & n ) ; long int entry [ n ] , count = 0 ; for ( long int e = 0 ; e < n ; e ++ ) { scanf ( "%ld" , & entry [ e ] ) ; } long int index1 = - 1 , index2 = - 1 ; for ( a = 0 ; a < n - 1 ; a ++ ) { if ( entry [ a ] > entry [ a + 1 ] ) { index2 = a ; count = count + ( index2 - index1 ) * ( index2 - index1 + 1 ) / 2 ; index1 = a ; } } if ( index2 != ( n - 1 ) ) { index1 = index2 ; index2 = n - 1 ; count = count + ( index2 - index1 ) * ( index2 - index1 + 1 ) / 2 ; } printf ( "%ld\n" , count ) ; } }
